description:
AOMEI Partition Assistant Standard allows you to realize disk upgrade/replacement, partition style conversion, OS migration and other disk managements without any difficulties.

Safely manage disk partitions without data loss.
Windows 11/10/8.1/8/7/Vista/ XP( 32-bit/64-bit).
Over 30 million+ Downloads Worldwide.
summary: Free disk partition software for home and personal use.
author: AOMEI
